sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The portracture of Sir Thomas Overbury, Knight, ætat 32 W. B. Elstracke, Renold, fl. 1590-1630. Holland, Compton.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : port.
Compton Holland, London : [1616?]
Broadside portrait of Sir Thomas Overbury, showing him writing his own epitaph, with verse at bottom of sheet signed: W.B. The portrait signed at lower edge: Renold Elstrack sculpsit, Compton Holland excudit. Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Imperfect: slightly faded. Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
=======

Broadside portrait of Sir Thomas Overbury, showing him writing his own epitaph, with verse at bottom of sheet signed: W.B. The portrait signed at lower edge: Renold Elstrack sculpsit, Compton Holland excudit. Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Imperfect: slightly faded. Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
